name: PerilousPotions
description:
Keep brewing and nobody explodes A game made for the Ludum Dare 49 Game Jam.

You play as a witch with a massive back-order of potions. The problem is - these potions are incredibly volatile when not mixed properly. You're not familiar with a lot of these plants - so you'll have to refer to your predecessor's notes to know what to add to each potion. 

You'll mix colors and ingredient attributes to create potions of questionable morals, but hey - witches gotta eat too.

How to Play:

Note: Be sure to read the item descriptions! The descriptions offer clues as to which ingredient to use in what potions. If you see the word “attract” in the description, then try using that ingredient in a love potion. Try Hexing someone with a "psychedelic" ingredient. Etc.

  • I recommend starting with Puzzle Mode, as it acts as a tutorial for the mechanics as well
  • Click and drag ingredients into the cauldron.
  • Right click to read ingredient descriptions for hints on which to choose.
  • Combine colors to make new colors! You have 4 colors to work with: Red, Blue, Yellow, and White. Mix and match them to fit the recipe.
  • These potions are incredibly volatile, if you mess up it may just blow up in your face!
Controls:

F1 - Fullscreen toggle

Left-Click - drag items

Right-Click - open item descriptions

Left/Right Arrow - show more ingredients

Esc - Close window
